# Arya Teja Rudraraju

> AI Product Leader & Agentic Systems Builder. Currently AI Product Manager at Pilvi Systems and Founder of LeSearch AI. Specializing in 0→1 AI product development, LLM reasoning, and Agentic workflows. Based in Dallas, TX.

I bridge the gap between AI research and engineering, building products that solve real problems using cutting-edge Generative AI.

## Key Projects

- **LeSearch AI**: AI-native research workspace. (Active, 50+ users)
- **Pilvi Systems**: Enterprise AI automation. (Active)

## Core Competencies

- **AI/ML**: Agentic Frameworks, LLMs (GPT-4, Claude 3, Gemini), RAG, Prompt Engineering, Evaluation Chains.
- **Product**: 0→1 Strategy, Technical PRDs, User Discovery, Analytics (Amplitude).
- **Engineering**: Next.js, Python, TypeScript, Supabase, Vector Databases.
